name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.hc:build: mkdir -p dna && cd dna-src && hc package --strip-meta -o ../dna/holofuel.hcpkg
scripts.build:scenario: npm run build:agent1 && npm run build:agent2
scripts.ui:build: cd ui-src && REACT_APP_DNA_INSTANCE=agent1_dna_instance npm run build && cd ..
scripts.ui:build-agent1: cd ui-src && REACT_APP_DNA_INSTANCE=agent1_dna_instance npm run build && cd ..
scripts.ui:build-agent2: cd ui-src && REACT_APP_DNA_INSTANCE=agent2_dna_instance npm run build && cd ..
